ComicInfo.Summary:
The Snare: Fleeing from slavers Sonja encounters a Spider Witch.
Tresses: Sonja enters the tower that holds Ruthaba, a princess with long tresses.
Sticks and Stones: Sonja chooses a young boy to fight for freedom beside her.
The Torch: Sonja avenges Amena.
Three Wishes: Sonja extracts three wishes from the wizard.
ComicInfo.Title: The Snare; Tresses; Sticks and Stones; The Torch; Three Wishes
